title: proposal
description: petition or referendum for a new law or a change in some existing law

expires.description: date at which this publication expires (milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00.000)

trustee.description: public key of trustee that should be used to process this proposal

area.description:
area of the proposal with fields separated by newlines, empty means the whole world, e.g.,
country=France
state=Bourgogne-Franche-Comté
county=Saône-et-Loire
city=Mâcon

description.description: detailed description of the proposal (markdown allowed)

question.description: question to which the citizen should answer

answers.description:
possible answers to the above question separated by newlines, e.g.,
yes
no
abstain

secret.description: whether the votes to the proposal should be anonymous or public

website.description: website providing more information about the proposal
